How can I find ur public key in key servers?

$ gpg --recv-key 0x64CA4324
...
gpgkeys: key 64CA4324 can't be retrieved
gpg: no valid OpenPGP data found.
gpg: Total number processed: 0
@Daniell Mesquita: Excellent! :)
What exactly happened to Zeronet??

I think there's a technical limitation regarding the password entropy for the traditional website login convention. The administrator of the website has an ability to modify the login module to hijack the bare passphrase rather than directly hashing it to the memory. That's why I think ZeroNet login method is superior..

[Jeremiah 14:14 Then the LORD said to me, “The prophets are prophesying lies in my name. I have not sent them or appointed them or spoken to them. They are prophesying to you false visions, divinations, idolatries and the delusions of their own minds. 15 Therefore this is what the LORD says about the prophets who are prophesying in my name: I did not send them, yet they are saying, ‘No sword or famine will touch this land.’ Those same prophets will perish by sword and famine.](https://www.biblestudytools.com/jeremiah/passage/?q=jeremiah+14:14-15)
